text: "Jumping Someone Else's Train" is a song by English gothic rock band The Cure. It was released as a stand-alone single in the United Kingdom. It is taken from the band's 1980 album Boys Don't Cry. It did not chart in the United Kingdom and the United States. ==Music video== The music video shows a speeded up view from the driver's cab of a train journey from London Victoria to Brighton Station. ==Track listing== ;7" vinyl # "Jumping Someone Else's Train" # "I'm Cold" == References == Category:1979 songs Category:The Cure songs
title: Jumping Someone Else's Train
